title: Ekko, the Boy Who Shattered Time, available now

replies.body: Ekko isn't that OP, sure his ult may be extremely strong and will defiantly get some sort of nerf but people constantly complain about Ekko is too OP
riot fuk this ekko, it seriously destroyed my gaming exprience. AOE stun slow and the fuking jump? seriously? and the damage. fuk this.
You know, you could always outplay said ekko, maybe build magic resist, like a {{item:3102}} . Is that too difficult? :)
yes when you should build damage if you are mid or adc
Peel OP

I don't believe the problem is his AOE stun slow nor the jump. They just need to increase his cooldown times and increase the time it takes for him to lvl up. That way he will become more of a jump, kill and run assassin with end game potential instead of dominating from the start and controlling whatever lane he is in. They certainly need to make him more difficult to play though, with the free rotation noobs are becoming surprisingly difficult to kill.
Ekko so broken haha
New cham always like God，op damage，op displacement，op control skills

Have you seen Bard{{champion:432}}?
Guy got a buff day 1.
All champs except supports. Supports are always really weak.
Hahahahahaha
